game.name: Mech Fortress
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mech Fortress는 각 포탑이 고유한 메커니즘을 가진 SF 타워 디펜스 게임입니다. 5×5 격자에 자유롭게 배치할 수 있으며, 목표는 모든 적을 처치하는 것입니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mech Fortress is a sci-fi tower defense game where each turret has unique mechanics. You can freely place them on a 5×5 grid, and your goal is to eliminate all enemies!
